DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to examine the length of ovarian stimulation with the timing of trigger in an IVF cycle and its potential to impact patient outcomes.
DOC.brief_title: The Impact of the Timing of Trigger on IVF Success
DOC.criteria: Planning to move forward with an IVF cycle Have met the requirements of being a patient at CCRM Colorado AMA: 3944 years old And/or DOR: AMH < 1 & FSH >10 (age independent) Contraindication for pregnancy Have not fulfilled requirements for IVF cycle Single gene couple or chromosomal rearrangement Severe male factor or testicular surgical sperm removal (need sufficient sperm for ICSI) One ovary Uterine anomalies Stage III or IV endometriosis Explained recurrent miscarriage PCO or PCOS Using donor oocyte or gestational carrier
